headline: International Flavors' DEB Platform Announces Commercial Debut
summary: IFF's DEB platform makes its first big commercial splash with a new laundry detergent launch focused on softness, cleaning power, and sustainability.

headline: International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF): A Fresh Look at Valuation After Facility Expansion and Biodegradable Product Launch
summary: If you have been watching International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) lately, you know there has been some real movement that could shake up how investors look at this stock. Just days ago, IFF opened its newly expanded LMR Naturals facility in Grasse and introduced its Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials platform in a major new consumer launch. These two announcements are all about scale, speed and a sharper focus on sustainable, natural ingredients. This positions IFF as both a science-driven...

headline: IFF expands LMR Naturals site in Grasse, advancing naturals innovation leadership
summary: GRASSE, France, September 08, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF), a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients and biosciences, today inaugurated its expanded LMR Naturals site in Grasse following a €10 million investment. The expansion increases the facility’s footprint by 75 percent to 4,687 square meters and includes a state-of-the-art pilot hall designed to accelerate the development of new natural ingredients. The upgraded site also counts on a newly completed experimental field nearby that
